code: import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch}from'react-router-dom';import ProfileList from'./components/ProfileList';import ProfileDetail from'./components/ProfileDetail';import ProfileForm from'./components/ProfileForm';import RegisterForm from'./components/RegisterForm';import LoginForm from'./components/LoginForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Switch,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Route,{exact:true,path:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to Tech Pioneers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/profiles",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileList,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/profiles/:id",children:_ref=>{let{match}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileDetail,{match:match,token:localStorage.getItem('token')});}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/edit-profile/:id",children:_ref2=>{let{match}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileForm,{profileId:match.params.id,token:localStorage.getItem('token')});}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/login",children:_ref3=>{let{history}=_ref3;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{onLogin:token=>{localStorage.setItem('token',token);history.push('/profiles');}});}})]})})});};export default App;
